abstract: A dictionary that represents a request to set up a deferred payment, such as a hotel booking or a pre-order.

items.description: The localized billing agreement the framework displays to the user prior to payment authorization.
items.name: billingAgreement

items.description: A description of the deferred payment.
items.name: paymentDescription

items.description: The time zone at the destination location of the payment.
items.name: freeCancellationDate

items.description: The time zone at the destination location of the payment.
items.name: freeCancellationDateTimeZone

items.description: A dictionary that contains details about the deferred payment.
items.name: deferredBilling

items.description: A URL that links to a page on your web site where the user can manage the payment method for the deferred payment, including deleting it.
items.name: managementURL

items.description: A URL to receive life-cycle notifications for the merchant-specific payment token the system issues for the request, if applicable.
items.name: tokenNotificationURL

items.description: A request for payment, which includes information about payment-processing capabilities, the payment amount, and shipping information.
items.name: ApplePayPaymentRequest

title: ApplePayDeferredPaymentRequest
